name: Alien Game (The Peck Zone)
description:
You're a washed-up alien war hero trying to reclaim fame by taking on an entire planet yourself in your old busted spacecraft!

Attack GREEN Zones, Avoid RED Zones;

[SPACEBAR] : Boost in direction of arrow (On-screen boost button not functional);

[FLIP]: Flip arrow rotation, don't spam or you'll get a cooldown;

[BOOM] : Attack target, must be destroyed within the time limit;

(Made for the "Mildly Infuriating Jam" hosted by LootGodamn and Roark01)
